<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// PDBContext</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This data structure is the top level entity that deals with PDB debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// information parsing.  This data structure exists only when there is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// need for a transparent interface to different debug information formats</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (e.g. PDB and DWARF).  More control and power over the debug information</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// access can be had by using the PDB interfaces directly.</span></CodeLine>
